fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: European Digital Therapeutics Partnership (DTP); Intend to participate in the European Commission's High-Level Expert Group on Artificial Intelligence
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Advocacy for use of robotic devices in relation to collating diagnostic data from clinical trials and at-home monitoring solutions, and the safe and clinically-validated processing and application of this type of information via relevant conferences, white papers, and blog posts.
goals__remit: To develop robotic solutions in collaboration with our partners. In the Digital Therapeutics Partnership our focus relates to solutions which enable the acquisition and use of continuous medical diagnostic information via robotic/smart devices, so that care and treatment becomes more preventive (early detection of disease), predictive (better risk stratification), and personalized (ability to optimize treatment to the individual).
